resources.string: Nuberol is produced by SEARLE, which contains paracetamol + Orphenadrine Citrate, which is analgesic and muscle relaxant tablets. If you are facing fever certain pains in your body, you can use Nuberol and Nuberol forte as a remedy.
Aspirin is used to treat pain, and reduce fever or inflammation. It is sometimes used to treat or prevent heart attacks, strokes, and chest pain .
Actiron CF is produced by Murfi, which contains paracetamol + Caffeine + Chlorpheniramine Maleate (CPM). It is an effective remedy for pain, fever and cold.
Acetaminophen is a non-opiate, analgesic and antipyretic, prescribed for headache, pain (muscle ache, backache) and fever either alone or combined with other medications.
Relieving mild to moderate pain such as headache, migraine, nerve pain toothache, sore throat, earache and rheumatic and muscular aches and pains. Relieving aches, pains, fever and discomfort

The active ingredient in Prothiaden is dosulepin hydrochloride. Prothiaden belongs to a group of medicines called tricyclic antidepressants. PROTHIADEN is used to treat depression and can also help reduce feelings of anxiety.

The active ingredient in Prothiaden is dosulepin hydrochloride. Prothiaden belongs to a group of medicines called tricyclic antidepressants. PROTHIADEN is used to treat depression and can also help reduce feelings of anxiety.

The active ingredient in Prothiaden is dosulepin hydrochloride. Prothiaden belongs to a group of medicines called tricyclic antidepressants. PROTHIADEN is used to treat depression and can also help reduce feelings of anxiety.

The active ingredient in Prothiaden is dosulepin hydrochloride. Prothiaden belongs to a group of medicines called tricyclic antidepressants. PROTHIADEN is used to treat depression and can also help reduce feelings of anxiety.
Naproxen is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug(NSAID). It works by reducing headache and pain in the body. Naproxen is used to treatpain or inflammation caused by conditions such as arthritis.
Treating infections caused by certain bacteria. It is also used to prevent or treat anthrax or plague in certain patients. Levofloxacin tablets are a quinolone antibiotic.
Treating infections caused by certain bacteria. It is also used to prevent or treat anthrax or plague in certain patients. Levofloxacin tablets are a quinolone antibiotic.
Treating infections caused by certain bacteria. It is also used to prevent or treat anthrax or plague in certain patients. Levofloxacin tablets are a quinolone antibiotic.
Temporarily relieving cough due to the common cold, upper respiratory tract infections, sinus inflammation, sore throat, or bronchitis. Dextromethorphan chewable tablets are a cough suppressant.

Fluitussin is a cough medicine. The tablets contain the active ingredient noscapine, a medicine that has an antitussive (cough-suppressing) effect. Fluitussin should only be used to treat dry (tickly) coughs

Dronabinol causes many effects on your central nervous system. Dronabinol is used to treat loss of appetite in people with AIDS. It is also used to treat severe nausea and vomiting that is caused by cancer chemotherapy.
Aprepitant is used with other medications to help prevent nausea and vomitingcaused by cancer drug treatment (chemotherapy). This medication is also used to prevent nausea and vomiting after surgery.
Dexamethasone is a steroid that prevents the release of substances in the body that cause inflammation.
Nabilone is used to treat severe nausea and vomiting caused by cancer chemotherapy. Nabilone is for use only when other medications have been unable to control the nausea and vomiting.
Droperidol is used to reduce nausea and vomiting caused by surgery or other medical procedures. Droperidol may also be used for purposes not listed in this medication guide.
Buscopan is used to relieve colicky abdominal pain that is caused by painful spasms in the muscles of the gastro-intestinal (GI) or genito-urinary (GU) tract. Spasms of the stomach
Lactulose is a synthetic sugar used to treat constipation. It is broken down in the colon into products that pull water out from the body and into the colon. This water softens stools.
Glucomannan is used for constipation, weight loss in adults and children, type 2 diabetes, blood sugar control, and lowering cholesterol

Bisacodyl is used to treat constipation. It may also be used to clean out the intestines before a bowel examination/surgery. Bisacodyl is known as a stimulant laxative. It works by increasing the movement of the intestines, helping the stool to come out.
Lomotil is the brand name of diphenoxylate and atropine, a combination prescription drug used to treat the symptoms of acute or chronic diarrhea.

Lisinopril is used to treat high blood pressure. Lowering high blood pressure helps prevent strokes, heart attacks, and kidney problems. It is also used to treat heart failure and to improve survival after a heart attack.

Atenolol is used with or without other medications to treat high blood pressure (hypertension). Lowering high blood pressure helps prevent strokes, heart attacks, and kidney problems. This medication is also used to treat chest pain (angina) and to improve survival after a heart attack.

Human insulin lowers your blood sugar level after injection. Each of the following human insulins is available in Penfill 3mL, a glass cartridge designed to be used with Novo Nordisk insulin delivery devices such as NovoPenÂ® 3: ActrapidÂ® is Neutral Insulin Injection. It is a neutral solution of human insulin (rys).

Amaryl (glimepiride) is an oral diabetes medicine that helps control blood sugar levels. Amaryl is used together with diet and exercise to treat type 2 diabetes. Insulin or other diabetes medicines are sometimes used in combination with Amaryl if needed.
DIAMICRON 60 mg MR is used when diet and exercise are not enough to control your blood glucose. DIAMICRON 60 mg MR can be used alone or together with insulin or other medicines for treating diabetes.

The recommended adult dose of acarbose varies. The starting dose is 50 mg once daily, with a gradual increase in dose as needed to control blood glucose. The maximum daily dose is 100 mg three times daily, taken with the first bite of a meal.

GNC Burn 60â¢ is a clinically proven thermogenic formula that helps to enhance metabolism, burn calories and boost energy levels. With its powerful ingredients, Burn 60 enhances cellular metabolic activity. For best results, use the healthy diet and exercise program included with Burn 60.

Calcium/magnesium/vitamin d is a dietary supplement. It works by providing extra calcium, magnesium, and vitamin D to your body.Treating or preventing calcium deficiency. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
Beta-carotene is used to decrease asthma symptoms caused by exercise; to prevent certain cancers, heart disease, cataracts, and age related macular degeneration (AMD).
For the treatment of Hypertension. This fixed dose combination is not intended for initial therapy.

Ascard is used to treat pain, and reduce fever or inflammation. Ascard is sometimes used to treat or prevent heart attacks, strokes, and chest pain (angina). Ascard should be used for cardiovascular conditions only under the supervision of a doctor.

Loprin 75mg tablet is used in fever, headache, arthralgia, myalgia, dental pain, post operative pain, rheumatoid arthritis, osteoarthritis and rheumatic fever.It also prevents recurrence of heart attack and stroke
Indications: Clenil Compositum is used for the treatment of bronchial asthma, chronic obstructive bronchopathy with asthmatic component.

Montelukast belongs to a group of medications known as leukotriene receptor antagonists. It is used to prevent and manage asthma symptoms and to relieve the symptoms of seasonal allergies, also known as seasonal allergic rhinitis or hay fever. Montelukast usually starts to work within one day.
